name: BookContents
shortdesc: A collection of book content objects.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new book content object.

parameters.name: fullName
parameters.shortdesc: The full path name of the new book content object.

parameters.name: at
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the book content object within the book. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new BookContent (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the BookContent.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContent with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContent with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContent with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContents within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The BookContent, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: BookContent, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The BookContent, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: BookContent, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first BookContent in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last BookContent in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle BookContent in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContent with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the BookContent that follows the desired BookContent.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the BookContent whose index follows the specified BookContent in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The BookContent whose index comes before the desired BookContent.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any BookContent in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every BookContent in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BookContent.
Returns the BookContent with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
